item.title: Trump causes flap with AI image of ‘Greenland penguin’ - timesofisrael.com
item.description: Trump causes flap with AI image of ‘Greenland penguin’ timesofisrael.comTrump’s penguin breaks the internet — and sends the left into a frenzy Fox NewsWhite House posts ‘Embrace the Penguin’ amid Greenland fight The HillTrump’s map stunt was ’the act of a juvenile,’ says border mayor sootoday.comWhite House Posts AI Slop of Trump and a Penguin in Greenland, Which Doesn’t Have Penguins Yahoo
